name: Aaliyah Abdelhadi
text: This business is going place! So full of friendly individuals who are always on their toes to help. Very thoughtful and the process is very easy to understand. I would definitely recommend this business to anyone who were to ask me!! Keep up the good work.

name: Tarajee Sabree
text: I love this company home like atmosphere with friendly people. Great for special need adults

name: audrey haskin
text: A caring sensitive place for your loved ones

text: I don't know

name: Ann Conner
text: Good food

name: Haley Wallace
text: Clean and dependable, my only complaint is alot of staff turn around they seem to do alot of hiring no consistent staffing.

name: shirley jones
text: Great interview with the assistant Director!

name: Joey Kyle
text: This place is awesome with people and they help everyone that needs it.

name: teresa Sanner
text: The lady answering the phone Laterri from Human Resources is very rude after 4 times calling and her hanging up on me. She finley connected me to someone else and to top it of i was only asking for a fax # to send in a employment verification. Wow

name: Charles Smith
text: I'm just going to the Arc of Central Alabama and I'm going to work everyday.

name: Patrice Carlisle
text: The Staff there is Second to None!

name: William C
text: Wonderful place for people with special needs. I am also an employee there.

name: arletta wyatt
text: It's a good place for you to go to for day have care

name: markhelders
text: So my brother and I had an amazing time at the ARC of Jefferson County’s Ability Academy this past Saturday, June 24th, at Samford University. My brother Tim was on the blue team and Ashton Sartin (ARC volunteer) was his team captain. Matt McCants (UAB Blazers, Cleveland Browns) was the coach in charge. He’s a Christian too and led two amazing prayers. Oh, and Matt McCants’ didn’t lead “politically correct” fake prayers like “Dear Mother Earth” or “Dear higher powers”, or “Dear Father/Mother”, BUT rather he began “Dear Father God” and ended with “In Jesus’ Name, Amen.” Christians must be BOLD! Also, all the ARC volunteers, including Grace Johnson and others’ whose names I forget are amazing, God’s angels on Earth. God bless! Mark N Tim

name: rodrick fields
text: Awesome love the vibe

name: Tanzika Bevis
text: Gave a two weeks notice and still didn't receive my  vacation time money or   no thanks for inviting working with our company for three years just unprofessional over all

text: I work there

text: I LOVVE working with this company

text: My husband goes there every day. Staff is great.

name: Dorothy Scarbrough
text: Best of the best! ExceptionAl director and staff, appropriate levels and varieties of activities for  each person.Accreditied also! I would add a star if I could. My husband, Bill, loves it.

text: This place is amazing in every way. I love the care and thought that went into every detail here.
